pkgmetadata.longdescription: Render Markdown with the C Library 'Sundown' // Provides R bindings to the 'Sundown' Markdown rendering library (https://github.com/vmg/sundown). Markdown is a plain-text formatting syntax that can be converted to 'XHTML' or other formats. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown for more information about Markdown.
